p:
The Differential Gene Expression (DGE) analysis was performed with DESeq. 2 package
57 from R. The genes (protein-coding, lncRNAs, circRNAs, and other transcripts) and microRNAs with adjusted p-value < 0.01 and Log2 Fold Change > |1.0| were considered for further analyses. Both transcriptome and microRNA expression analysis was carried out in six biological replicates.
